<iati-identifier>GB-CHC-283302-GDRC08</iati-identifier>     <title xml:lang="en">Promoting Gender Equality and Food Security in Mushie</title>     <description xml:lang="en" type="1">This project aims to empower small holder farmers\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd organisations, especially women\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds groups, to play an active and effective role in the rural development of Mushie and to improve their agricultural production for the benefit of the population of Mushie depending on this sector for their survival</description>     <activity-status code="2"/>     <activity-date
